ActivateFlowLog.title: ActivateFlowLog
ActivateFlowLog.summary: Enables log delivery for flow logs.

AttachExpressConnectRouterChildInstance.title: AttachExpressConnectRouterChildInstance
AttachExpressConnectRouterChildInstance.summary: Associates a virtual border router (VBR) with an Express Connect router (ECR).

CheckAddRegionToExpressConnectRouter.title: CheckAddRegionToExpressConnectRouter
CheckAddRegionToExpressConnectRouter.summary: Checks the Cloud Data Transfer (CDT) service required to add a region to an Express Connect router (ECR).

CreateExpressConnectRouterAssociation.title: CreateExpressConnectRouterAssociation
CreateExpressConnectRouterAssociation.summary: Associates a virtual private cloud (VPC) or a transit router (TR) with an Express Connect router (ECR).

CreateFlowLog.title: CreateFlowLog
CreateFlowLog.summary: Creates a flow log and enables log delivery.

DeleteExpressConnectRouterAssociation.title: DeleteExpressConnectRouterAssociation
DeleteExpressConnectRouterAssociation.summary: Disassociates an Express Connect router (ECR) from a virtual private cloud (VPC) or a transit router (TR).

DescribeDisabledExpressConnectRouterRout.title: DescribeDisabledExpressConnectRouterRouteEntries
DescribeDisabledExpressConnectRouterRout.summary: Queries the route entries that are disabled on an Express Connect router (ECR).

DescribeExpressConnectRouter.title: DescribeExpressConnectRouter
DescribeExpressConnectRouter.summary: Queries a list of Express Connect routers (ECRs).

DescribeExpressConnectRouterAllowedPrefi.title: DescribeExpressConnectRouterAllowedPrefixHistory
DescribeExpressConnectRouterAllowedPrefi.summary: Queries the historical route prefixes of an Express Connect router (ECR).

DescribeExpressConnectRouterAssociation.title: DescribeExpressConnectRouterAssociation
DescribeExpressConnectRouterAssociation.summary: Queries the virtual private clouds (VPCs) and transit routers (TRs) associated with an Express Connect router (ECR).

DescribeExpressConnectRouterChildInstanc.title: DescribeExpressConnectRouterChildInstance
DescribeExpressConnectRouterChildInstanc.summary: Queries the virtual border routers (VBRs) that are associated with an Express Connect router (ECR).

DescribeExpressConnectRouterInterRegionT.title: DescribeExpressConnectRouterInterRegionTransitMode
DescribeExpressConnectRouterInterRegionT.summary: Queries the cross-region forwarding modes of an Express Connect router (ECR).

DescribeExpressConnectRouterRegion.title: DescribeExpressConnectRouterRegion
DescribeExpressConnectRouterRegion.summary: Queries a list of regions in which resources related to an Express Connect router (ECR) are deployed.

DescribeExpressConnectRouterRouteEntries.title: DescribeExpressConnectRouterRouteEntries
DescribeExpressConnectRouterRouteEntries.summary: Queries the route entries of an Express Connect router (ECR).

DescribeInstanceGrantedToExpressConnectR.title: DescribeInstanceGrantedToExpressConnectRouter
DescribeInstanceGrantedToExpressConnectR.summary: Queries the network instances whose permissions are granted to an Express Connect router (ECR).

DetachExpressConnectRouterChildInstance.title: DetachExpressConnectRouterChildInstance
DetachExpressConnectRouterChildInstance.summary: Disassociates a virtual border router (VBR) from an Express Connect router (ECR).

DisableExpressConnectRouterRouteEntries.title: DisableExpressConnectRouterRouteEntries
DisableExpressConnectRouterRouteEntries.summary: Disables route entries of an Express Connect router (ECR).

EnableExpressConnectRouterRouteEntries.title: EnableExpressConnectRouterRouteEntries
EnableExpressConnectRouterRouteEntries.summary: Enables route entries of an Express Connect router (ECR).

ForceDeleteExpressConnectRouter.title: ForceDeleteExpressConnectRouter
ForceDeleteExpressConnectRouter.summary: Deletes an Express Connect router (ECR) and disassociates the virtual private cloud (VPC), transit router (TR), and virtual border router (VBR) associated with the ECR.

GrantInstanceToExpressConnectRouter.title: GrantInstanceToExpressConnectRouter
GrantInstanceToExpressConnectRouter.summary: Grants permissions on a virtual private cloud (VPC) or a virtual border router (VBR) to an Express Connect router (ECR) of another account.

ListExpressConnectRouterSupportedRegion.title: ListExpressConnectRouterSupportedRegion
ListExpressConnectRouterSupportedRegion.summary: Queries a list of regions in which the Express Connect router (ECR) feature is activated.

ListTagResources.title: ListTagResources
ListTagResources.summary: Queries a list of tags that are added to an Express Connect router (ECR).

ModifyExpressConnectRouter.title: ModifyExpressConnectRouter
ModifyExpressConnectRouter.summary: Modifies the properties such as the name of an Express Connect router (ECR).

ModifyExpressConnectRouterAssociationAll.title: ModifyExpressConnectRouterAssociationAllowedPrefix
ModifyExpressConnectRouterAssociationAll.summary: Modifies the route prefixes of a virtual private cloud (VPC) or a transit router (TR) that is associated with an Express Connect router (ECR).

ModifyExpressConnectRouterInterRegionTra.title: ModifyExpressConnectRouterInterRegionTransitMode
ModifyExpressConnectRouterInterRegionTra.summary: Modifies the cross-region forwarding mode of an Express Connect router (ECR).

ModifyFlowLogAttribute.title: ModifyFlowLogAttribute
ModifyFlowLogAttribute.summary: Modifies the name, description, sampling rate, and sampling interval.

MoveResourceGroup.title: MoveResourceGroup
MoveResourceGroup.summary: Modifies the resource group to which an Express Connect router (ECR) belongs.

RevokeInstanceFromExpressConnectRouter.title: RevokeInstanceFromExpressConnectRouter
RevokeInstanceFromExpressConnectRouter.summary: Revokes permissions on a virtual private cloud (VPC) or a virtual border router (VBR) from an Express Connect router (ECR) owned by another account.

SynchronizeExpressConnectRouterInterRegi.title: SynchronizeExpressConnectRouterInterRegionBandwidth
SynchronizeExpressConnectRouterInterRegi.summary: Synchronizes the forwarding bandwidth limit between regions for an Express Connect router (ECR).

TagResources.title: TagResources
TagResources.summary: Adds tags to an Express Connect router (ECR). You can add tags to only one ECR each time you call this operation. You can add multiple tags at a time.

UntagResources.title: UntagResources
UntagResources.summary: Removes tags from an Express Connect router (ECR).
